about_the_game:
They're coming for your gardens.


A plague is sweeping the land. Only you can uncover the mystery of why the worlds gardening supplies keep going missing.

This DLC quest pack includes the main content quest, "God Makes Gnome Mistakes". To begin the quest, simply go to your ship HQ and you will receive a distress call.

Oh, yeah, uh, there's also a secondary quest.

Quest Pack 1/3

short_description: In the first of three quest packs, choose the fate of a displaced race of creature that threatens our worlds gardening supplies. Two new quests are included.
